title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > Overview > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Overview
content: > **Image:** RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector
parent_content: > **Image:** RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector

title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12023 Soil Moisture Connector Module Overview
content: RAK12023 is a soil moisture connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock IO connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has three (3) connectors dedicated to the RAK12035. RAK12035 is a separate soil moisture sensor probe that can be connected to the RAK12023 module. Only one RAK12035 soil moisture sensor can be connected to the RAK12023 simultaneously.
parent_content: RAK12023 is a soil moisture connector module. It has one (1) standard WisBlock IO connector, which you can connect with the WisBlock Base. It also has three (3) connectors dedicated to the RAK12035. RAK12035 is a separate soil moisture sensor probe that can be connected to the RAK12023 module. Only one RAK12035 soil moisture sensor can be connected to the RAK12023 simultaneously.

title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > Overview > Features > RAK12023 Sensor PCB Module Requirements and Specifications
content:
- A Separate sensor PCB module [RAK12035](overview.md) is required.
- Three (3) available connectors for the soil sensor PCB module RAK12035 (Only one sensor can be connected!).
- Module size: 15 x 25mm
parent_content:
- A Separate sensor PCB module [RAK12035](overview.md) is required.
- Three (3) available connectors for the soil sensor PCB module RAK12035 (Only one sensor can be connected!).
- Module size: 15 x 25mm

title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Connector Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Connector Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12023 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12023 Mounting Mechanism on a WisBlock Base Module
parent_content:
The RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Connector Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12023 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12023 Mounting Mechanism on a WisBlock Base Module

title: RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Moisture Sensor Connector Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Module Pinout and Connector Details
content:
The RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12023 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12023 Pinout Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- Only **I2C** related pin, **IO4**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to the WisConnector.
parent_content:
The RAK12023 WisBlock Soil Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12023 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12023 Pinout Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- Only **I2C** related pin, **IO4**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to the WisConnector.
- **3V3_S** voltage output from the WisBlock Base that powers the RAK12023 module can be controlled by the WisBlock Core via WB_IO2 (WisBlock IO2 pin). This makes the module ideal for low-power IoT projects since the WisBlock Core can totally disconnect the power of the RAK12023 module.
